review: The reason i like this hotel is its location-very close to the Rudrapur city railway station.This is its key plus point. The main market and other facilities are very easily accessible. Food is average and service is decent.
name: Sureka S

review: If you re looking for a hotel at a near prime location but very economical price this is the place to be. The rates are rock bottom. The room quality and service are great for the price. A good hotel by any yardstick. Good for short business stays.
name: Alok S

review: The facilities offered by the hotel are decent and the hotel is located in the middle of the central business area. The food and room service are good. The staff are cooperative and the pricing is decent.
name: Sureka S

review: The place where this hotel is located is very central and in the heart of the city. This is a great benefit if one wants to go anywhere. The room quality, cleanliness and other amenitiea are as good as any at the price which you pay for this place. Overall a very good place.
name: Alok S
